NewsArticle.Title: The Divine Love Ring
NewsArticle.Content:
The Divine Love Ring
For such an occasion I will distributed one of our most sacred item, the Divine Love Ring. If your love is true, I will consider giving you one, but only if you make a promise. So if you dare, venture through the dangerous forest and tell me your love. I always enjoy a little company.
Princess Fae
((Happy Valentine's Day!))
